text: Peter Hamilton Raven (born June 13, 1936) is an American botanist and environmentalist. He is known for being the director, now President Emeritus, of the Missouri Botanical Garden. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile on the International Cosmos Prize website Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American botanists Category:American environmentalists Category:Scientists from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Peter H. Raven
